title: Who is the most attractive Norwegian person and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s too many attractive Norwegians and so there isn’t just one who’s most attractive. When there are 7s, 8s and 9s everywhere, it gets boring, but boring in a good way. Attraction isn’t strictly visual, but is also about voice, movement/gait, taste, touch and smell. Attraction varies so your candidates for most attractive Norwegians might be fairly different to a list another might make.

Kristian Valen because he makes me laugh hysterically. Rolv Wesenlund because he's also a comedian. Harald Heide Steen Jr.(comedian ) Ezinne Okporaebo - Norwegian sprinter. Therese Johaug - super cute cross country skier. Maria Mena - awesome singer/songwriter. Mira Craig - sexy bimbo. Vazelina Bilopphøggers - because they remind me of my roots. A-ha - a band filled with super hot dolls is never wrong(most successful group out of Norway ever) Kurt Nilsen - the most versatile voice(our people's champion).
